name: part_004
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】AZKi SOLO LiVE 2025 ＂Departure＂【ぴあアリーナMM】 [7UlZnyO79Xg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Scrolling fan messages (yosegaki) for AZKi's solo live concert 'Departure'.
Title card for the concert featuring date, venue, and a 'starting soon' notice.
Important notices for concert attendees regarding flashing lights and cheering rules.
Announcement for the second sale of live goods after the performance.
Continuation of the scrolling fan messages background.
